def test_home_business_edit_sign(self):
        try:
            # 初始化我的主页个人说明书状态为商务
            self.test_home_business_status_change()

            # 编辑个人简介
            edit_element = self.page.get_element(selector="", xpath="//image[contains(@src, '编辑.png')]",
                                                 max_timeout=max_timeout)
            edit_element.click()

            # 等待编辑弹窗出现
            self.page.element_is_exists(
                selector=".fu-textarea textarea",
                max_timeout=max_timeout
            )
            self.logger.info(f"已弹出个人简介弹窗")
            self.capture(f"已弹出个人简介弹窗_{time.strftime("%H%M%S")}")

            # 输入内容
            input_element = self.page.get_element(selector=".fu-textarea textarea", max_timeout=max_timeout)
            # 清空弹窗内容
            input_element.input("")

            self.logger.info(f"弹窗个人简介内容已清空")
            self.capture(f"弹窗个人简介内容已清空_{time.strftime("%H%M%S")}")

            # 随机生成1-300字内容
            self.logger.info("生成随机文本内容...")
            random_sign = random_text_generator.generate_random_text(
                min_len=1,
                max_len=300,
                chinese_ratio=0.8  # 80%中文+20%英文
            )
            self.logger.info(f"生成随机文本（长度：{len(random_sign)} 字）：{random_sign}")

            input_element.input(random_sign)
            time.sleep(0.5)

            if input_element.value == "":
                input_element.input(random_sign)

                # 验证个人简介输入内容是否正确
                inputted_text = input_element.attribute("value")
                assert inputted_text == [random_sign], f"输入内容不一致：预期{[random_sign]}，实际{inputted_text}"
                self.logger.info(f"输入个人简介成功：{inputted_text} ")

            self.logger.info(f"输入个人简介成功：{input_element.value} ")
            self.capture(f"输入个人简介成功_{time.strftime("%H%M%S")}")

            # AI 润色
            business_ai_editing_btn_list = self.page.get_elements(myhome_ai_editing_element, max_timeout=max_timeout)
            for business_ai_editing_btn in business_ai_editing_btn_list:
                # 点击商务的 AI 润色
                print(f"ai_src:{business_ai_editing_btn.attribute("src")}")
                print(f"myhome_business_ai_editing_src:{myhome_business_ai_editing_src}")
                if business_ai_editing_btn.attribute("src") == myhome_business_ai_editing_src:
                    business_ai_editing_btn.tap()

                    start_time = time.strftime("%H%M%S")

                    self.logger.info(f"点击AI润色")
                    self.capture(f"点击AI润色_{time.strftime("%H%M%S")}")

                    while True:
                        end_btn = self.page.element_is_exists(myhome_ai_editing_loading_src, max_timeout=max_timeout)
                        if not end_btn:
                            end_time = time.strftime("%H%M%S")
                            break

                    total_time = int(end_time) - int(start_time)
                    self.logger.info(f"AI 润色消耗的时间为：{total_time} 秒")

                    # 获取润色后的内容
                    ai_input_element = self.page.get_element(selector=".fu-textarea textarea", max_timeout=max_timeout)
                    ai_inputted_text = ai_input_element.attribute("value")[0]
                    print(f"ai_inputted_text:{ai_inputted_text}")
                    time.sleep(1)

            # 保存
            save_button = self.page.get_element(selector="text", inner_text="保存", max_timeout=max_timeout)
            save_button.click()

            # 等待保存成功：验证新签名已显示
            self.page.element_is_exists(
                selector="text",
                text_contains=ai_inputted_text,
                max_timeout=max_timeout
            )

        except Exception as e:
            self.logger.error(f"编辑签名失败：{str(e)}")
            # 异常时截图
            self.capture(f"编辑签名失败_{time.strftime("%H%M%S")}")
            time.sleep(1)
            raise
